data.eml:eml: A revision of the Chinese Gasteruptiidae (Hymenoptera, Evanioidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ke-xin, Achterberg, Cornelis van, Xu, Zai-fu (2012): A revision of the Chinese Gasteruptiidae (Hymenoptera, Evanioidea). ZooKeys 237: 1-123, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.237.3956, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.237.3956
